group_1.textRight: Whoa![chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] You scared me...
Don't yell outta nowhere!

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: You were really spacing out there. It's not@like you. What's up?
Oh, did you realize you forgot somethin'?@I do that all the time!

group_1.textLeft: Yes... That's exactly it. I just remembered@something, Ayame.

group_1.textRight: Yeah? What was it?

group_1.textLeft: I have some ice cream that I bought for you.

group_1.textRight: For real, for real?! All riiight! Thanks, @Konoha!
Can I eat it now? Can I? I can eat it now,@right?

group_1.textLeft: Sure, go ahead.

group_1.textRight: Woohoo! I'm gonna go get it!
Were you telling the truth just now?

group_1.textLeft: I really did get ice cream for her. As for@me remembering just now...that was a lie.

group_1.textRight: What really happened?

group_1.textLeft: I'll try to tell you quickly, before Ayame@gets back...
Just now I...I think I saw some kind of@illusion...

group_1.textRight: Huh? What makes you say that?

group_1.textLeft: It's a little fuzzy...
But I think it was an illusion because I saw@something...
Ayame was suffering, right in front of me.@It was...really bad.

group_1.textRight: She was?!

group_1.textLeft: It wasn't a dream...@[chara:302601:lipSynch_0][chara:302601:motion_000][chara:302601:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]â€¦[freeze:1.0][chara:302601:lipSynch_1]What was I doing when it happened?

group_1.textRight: Well, you definitely weren't sleeping.@You were just staring into space.

group_1.textLeft: It really felt like it was happening right@before my eyes...

group_1.textRight: Konoha! I LOVE this kind of ice cream!

group_1.textLeft: Ah...good. I remember you telling me you@liked it.

group_1.textRight: Hehe! I'm sooo happy!
Hm? Where's your spoon?
Oh, darn it! I forgot to get one...
One sec! I'll be right back!
So, anyway, everything felt real to you?

group_1.textLeft: Nothing like that has ever happened to me@before.

group_1.textRight: Do you think it was...a daydream?
You know how sometimes you see a fantasy@play out, even though you're awake?

group_1.textLeft: A daydream, huh?[chara:302601:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.0][chara:302601:lipSynch_1] Oh![chara:302601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:302601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:302601:cheek_0]
Do you think it's possible that someone@was showing that to me?

group_1.textRight: Someone? What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: Think about it... What are we now?

group_1.textRight: Magical Girls. [chara:302701:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.0][chara:302701:lipSynch_1][chara:302701:cheek_0][chara:302701:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:302701:mouthOpen_1][chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh, that's what you mean!

group_1.textLeft: As Magical Girls that's the first thing we@should consider.

group_1.textRight: But who could it be? Any ideas?

group_1.textLeft: No... And I don't know what their motive@would be either.

group_1.textRight: I got it! I got the spoon!

group_1.textLeft: Mhm...

group_1.textRight: It looks so good!
Homf! Mmm! It is soooooo good!

group_1.textLeft: Don't tell Ayame about this.

group_1.textRight: But why?!

group_1.textLeft: She'll only be confused if we tell her all@this vague information.
I think it'd be better to keep it between@us for now.
And anyway, it'd only worry her.
I don't...want to do that to her...

group_1.textRight: Right, I understand.
Do you really not remember anything else?

group_1.textLeft: No, I don't...

group_1.textRight: And it didn't feel like magic or anything?

group_1.textLeft: No...

group_1.textRight: It's frustrating being completely in the dark.

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, please just keep your guard up.

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah, I will...
